column2: "You've really gotten used to using a rifle. It definitely showed."
"But that doesn't mean you're stronger or tougher. Knowing when you've had enough is an important part of the job."
"Even I pull back when it's time. After all, that lets me come back fresh and stronger for even more killing next time."
"The stupidest thing an ARKS member can do is mistake recklessness for courage. Remember that."
"Seeing idiots like that makes me want to shoot them. So be careful. I'd hate to have to accidentally shoot you in the back. Hee hee!"
